polearms.name: Banner Spear
polearms.lore: A spear decorated with Christmas Elf battle banners. Excellent reach.

polearms.name: Candy Cane Lance
polearms.lore: A decorative yet deadly lance made from reinforced peppermint.

polearms.name: Ice Drill
polearms.lore: Used by Ice Elves to bore through thick ice. Extremely high piercing damage.

polearms.name: Robot Antenna
polearms.lore: A salvaged antenna from a giant Toykin robot, repurposed as a staff.

polearms.name: North Star Spear
polearms.lore: Topped with a crystalline star that guides the wielder. Used by elite guard.

polearms.name: Hard Chocolate Spear
polearms.lore: Made from tempered, dark chocolate. Surprisingly durable, but melts near fire.

polearms.name: Sundae Skewer
polearms.lore: A tall, sharp ice-cream cone polearm. Hits cause opponents to suffer a momentary cold shock.

polearms.name: Fisherman's Harpoon
polearms.lore: A heavy, barbed spear designed for hunting large ice creatures in the frozen seas.

polearms.name: Hunting Spear
polearms.lore: Standard issue hunting equipment for Ice Elf tribesmen.

polearms.name: Bone Spear
polearms.lore: Simple, sharp spear crafted from the leg bone of a frozen mammoth.

polearms.name: Caribaser
polearms.lore: Refactored from the parts and shell of a giant crab. Its strikes are heavy and blunt.

polearms.name: Luminescent Staff
polearms.lore: A simple staff with a permanently lit Toykin candle. Used to light dark corridors.

polearms.name: Stained Glass Lance
polearms.lore: A delicate yet powerful lance made from enchanted stained glass. Shatters on impact but reforms quickly.
